tool.name: createDerivedMD

param.name: workspace
param.dialogReference: The path and name of a geodatabase where the Mosaic Dataset will be created. Note - this tool will not CREATE a geodatabase, so it must exist prior to execution. The Dialog allows you to pick mosaic dataset and the name field will be updated accordingly

param.name: md_name
param.dialogReference: The name of the mosaic dataset.

param.name: dspref
param.dialogReference: Spatial Reference of the Mosaic dataset, if the Mosaic dataset exist the field will be disabled

param.name: datapath
param.dialogReference: Path of the Mosaic datasets, it will be used as source data, and will be added using table raster type

tool.summary: This tool will be used to build Derived Mosaic dataset. The Tool Geodatabase and Mosaic data as input, for the source data it takes one or Multiple Mosaic dataset. Spatial Reference can also be defined,

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool will be used to build Derived Mosaic dataset. The Tool Geodatabase and Mosaic data as input, for the source data it takes one or Multiple Mosaic dataset. Spatial Reference can also be defined,
